channel.title: Client Background Help
channel.description:
Hello all, So I downloaded Toms Cache Suite and loaded my client cache, I deleted the login box so it is transparent and I went into my spirits folder and deleted the loginbox.png I know have a clear login box which is exactly what I wanted but the loading Bar appears and the old text, How do i fix this ?
Please Help Regards Dhfhy1
[IMG]http://i302.photobucket.com/albums/nn119/PhotoCrazzy/Background-2.png[/img]

item.title: Client Background Help
item.dc:creator: @Dhfhy1 Dhfhy1
item.description:
@Dhfhy1 wrote:

Yeah But I want the background to still stay the same when it gets to that part, and Its hard perfecting the size of the login box and the exact demensions of where it is positioned, unless there is a program that will help me with this.
